name: Boliscape - the ball escape game
description:
Xelart game studio brings to you the ultimate ball escape game. The objective of the game is very simple: you control a ball that simply rolls and has to escape from 30 different rooms.

By playing and interacting physically with the objects in the room, you will find that some objects are more useful than others to help you in your escape. And remember, as in real life, everything that happens in the rooms follows the laws of physics.

Finally, if you have no clue on how to escape from a room, we will help you with 2 hints.

Will you be able to escape from the 30 rooms without even using a single hint? :D
